hadiths.text: Hanzalah narrated that he heard Tawus say:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Ruqba is not permissible. Whoever is given something on the basis of Ruqba, it is part of his estate

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى أَبِي الزُّبَيْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Abu Az-Zubair
